excerpt: A vegan version of the classic buffalo wings made with cauliflower florets
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together the flour, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and water
Dip the cauliflower florets in the batter, shake off any excess, and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the cauliflower is tender and golden brown
While the cauliflower is baking, whisk together the hot sauce and melted vegan butter in a saucepan over low heat
After the cauliflower is baked, pour the hot sauce mixture over the cauliflower florets and toss to coat
Bake for an additional 5-10 minutes, until the sauce is bubbly and caramelized
Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve hot
